The college offers undergraduate, postgraduate, and research programs under various specializations. Admission to the courses are based on the basis of marks secured in the previous qualifying examinations. For PG courses, the institute conducts an entrance examination in an online mode.

Situated in one of the most beautiful cities of India – Pune, the Institute showcases a state-of-the-art infrastructure inclusive of library, conference rooms, computer laboratories, air conditioned classrooms and cafeterias. It has highly experienced and talented faculties who know how to tap the potential of the students for making them future leaders of the nation. As a centre of excellence, it strives to stay competitive by periodically updating its curriculum to meet the international standards and attain the status of being world class management institute.

College_Name: Amity Global Business School, Pune
College_Summary: Amity Global Business School (AGBS), Pune offers a post-graduation program in the discipline of Management and Business Administration. The institute comes under the aegis of Amity Education Group. AGBS has been ranked the No. 1 Not-For-Profit Private University in India by India Today. The institute offers PG degree courses in the discipline of Management and Business Administration. AGBS Pune offers a 2-year integrated PGPM+MBA and a 3-year GDPA+BBA course in partnership with Amity University. Admission will be based on percentage in the qualifying Aptitude Exam, Group Discussion and Personal Interview. Candidates can apply to the institute via their official website.

College_Name: Deccan College Post Graduate and Research Institute, Pune
College_Summary: Deccan College Post Graduate and Research Institute, Pune is the third oldest educational institution in India. Established in 1821, Deccan College Postgraduate and Research Institute offer M.A, M.Phil and PhD degrees for prospective students. Admission for M.A degree programs is done based on marks secured in the qualifying examination while admission for MPhil and PhD programs is done through an entrance test conducted by the college. Candidates having a valid score in NET/SET/ MPhil/JRF Entrance exams are exempted from the Research Entrance Test conducted by the Institute.

College_Name: IGIDR Mumbai
College_Summary: Indira Gandhi Institute of Development Research (IGIDR) is an advanced research institute established and fully funded by the Reserve Bank of India for carrying out research on development issues from a multi-disciplinary point of view. The institute offers PhD programs in Development studies and a Master of Science program in Economics. The institute has one of the largest social science libraries in Asia.

College_Name: International Institute for Population Sciences
College_Summary: International Institute for Population Sciences (IIPS), Mumbai, is an autonomous institute established in the year 1956 by the Government of India in a joint partnership with the UN and Tata Trust. IIPS runs seven academic departments and offers postgraduate, doctoral, and post-doctoral courses and fellowships. The courses offered are M.A., MSc., M.Phil., Ph.D., Post Doctoral Fellowship. Admissions are conducted on the basis of the Entrance exam conducted by the Institute.

College_Name: Kavikulguru Kalidas Sanskrit University - [KKSU], Nagpur
College_Summary: Kavikulguru Kalidas Sanskrit University, Nagpur was established by the efforts of Shri P.V. Narasimha Rao (Former Prime Minister of India), Late Shri Sudhakarrao Naik and Dr Shrikant Jichkar on September 18, 1997. It is a State University recognized by UGC, under Act of 1956 & a member of Association of Indian Universitites (AIU). A total of 56 colleges fall under the jurisdiction of the University. It is sitauated at Mauda Road, Ramtek , Nagpur (District), Maharashtra.

College_Name: KIMS Karad
College_Summary: Krishna Institute of Medical Sciences University (KIMS) is a private university located in Karad, Maharashtra, India. It was established in 1984 and is recognized by the University Grants Commission (UGC) and the Medical Council of India (MCI). KIMS University offers undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctoral programs in various fields of medicine, dentistry, nursing, physiotherapy, and other allied health sciences.

College_Name: MUHS

The university has 403 affiliated colleges/ institutes. MUHS offers UG, PG, and Ph.D. courses in Medical, Dental, Ayurveda, Unani, Homeopathy, Nursing, and Physiotherapy. The university also offers fellowship, certificate courses, and UG/PG Diploma courses under various specializations.

The UG, PG & Super specialty courses have been recognized by MCI from time to time. The university has well-experienced faculties to deliver quality medical education.

Admission to the Super Specialty course (M.Ch. also, DM) is based totally on the NEET SS score. The minimum eligibility for MBBS is 10+2 with a minimum of 50% marks (45% for SC/ST) in PCB and pass in English.

College_Name: IICMR Pune
College_Summary: Institute of Industrial and Computer Management and Research, (IICMR) Pune is a renowned institute which was established in 2002. IICMR Pune offers state-of-the-art facilities, a well experienced faculty and placement opportunities in the best international and domestic companies. It is affiliated to the Savitribai Phule Pune University and is approved by AICTE. The institute offers post graduate courses such as MBA and MCA. Additionally, it also offers PhD at the Research level. Admission is based on an entrance examination.

College_Name: SNDT Women's University, Centre of Distance Education (SNDT CDE), Mumbai
College_Summary: SNDT Women’s University was founded in 1916 by Maharshi Dr. Dhondo Keshav Karve. It was the very first University exclusively for women. It was also the first women’s university in the whole of South-East Asia. The headquarters is located in church gate Mumbai. It has 2 other locations; Juhu in Mumbai and Karve Road in Pune.

College_Name: Bhavna trust's Junior & Degree College of Commerce & Science, Mumbai
College_Summary: Bhavna Trust Junior & Degree College of Commerce & Science is a private institution established in 2003. The college is located in Shivaji Chowk, Opp Freeway, Deonar, Mumbai, Maharashtra State in about 15,000 sq. ft. area. The college is affiliated to the University of Mumbai.

Chhatrapati Shahu Institute of Business Education and Research - [CSIBER ], Kolhapur
College_Summary: Chhatrapati Shahu Institute of Business Education and Research (CSIBER), Kolhapur, Maharashtra was established in 1976. It is a private institute, recognized by UGC and affiliated to Shivaji University. It has been accredited A+ by NAAC. It offers full-time PG courses such as MBA, MCA, M.Sc, MSW, M.Com and a PG Diploma. Additionally, CSIBER also offers M.Phil at the Research level. Admission is either based on merit or an entrance examination. Candidates can apply to the college in online mode.

College_Name: CPC, Nagpur- City Premier College
College_Summary: City Premier College is affiliated to RTMNU, Nagpur and approved by UGC. The college offers UG and PG courses in Computer Science, Commerce and Management. The most popular courses Admission to the courses offered will be done based on candidate's merit in the previous qualifying examination. The highest placement package offered to CPC students is around INR 4 LPA.

College_Name: NMIMS Kirit P. Mehta School of Law - [KPMSOL], Mumbai
College_Summary: NMIMS Kirit P. Mehta School of Law (KPMSOL), Mumbai comes under the aegis of SVKM’s NMIMS Deemed to be University. The institute has a record of providing students with 100% placement assistance. The highest salary package amounts to INR 16 LPA. KPMSOL Mumbai offers undergraduate degree programs, postgraduate degree programs and doctoral programs in the discipline of Law. Admission is done on the basis of the merit and cut-off criteria of the institute.

College_Name: DRK College of Commerce Kolhapur
College_Summary: D.R.K College of Commerce was established in 1957 under the supervision of the Council of Education. It is affiliated to Shivaji University Kolhapur and also under the scrutiny of UGC. The college has also been accredited by NIRF. The institute has also been accredited by NAAC with ‘A’ grade. Audit report by NIRF for the year 2020 is available on their website including information regarding all aspects of college from No. of students to no. of faculties available.

College_Name: Indian Maritime University, Navi Mumbai
College_Summary: Indian Maritime University (IMU) is established in the year 2008 and has its headquarters at Chennai. It has six campuses all over India such as Chennai, Kolkata, Mumbai port, Navi Mumbai and Visakhapatnam. The campus at Navi Mumbai was established in the year 2017. The University deals with a variety of courses including oceanography, maritime law and history which also include practical topics such as search and rescue at sea and the transportation of dangerous goods. The campus was formerly known as Training Ship Chanakya. The college offers both undergraduate and postgraduate courses.

College_Name: Ramanand Arya D.A.V. College, Mumbai
College_Summary: Ramanand Arya D.A.V. college Mumbai is a private university and is approved by AICTE, accredited by NAAC. Ramanand Arya D.A.V. is popular for providing B.Com and M.com. Ramanand Arya D.A.V. college offers B.com and M.Com in many specializations. Admissions in the programs are based on the merit list.

Deviprasad Goenka Management College of Media Studies -  [DGMC], Mumbai
College_Summary: Deviprasad Goenka Management College of Media Studies (DGMC), Mumbai is a premier media and communications institute with a state-of-the-art infrastructure, where students, researchers and media professionals interact to facilitate dynamic career paths. It is supported by its parent body RSET which has been in the field of education for over seven decades. DGMC provides courses on Journalism, Advertising, Communication and Filmmaking at undergraduate and postgraduate levels, and offers autonomous Postgraduate Programs (PGP) in various verticals of the media such as Integrated Marketing, Advertising and Communications, Event Management, Filmmaking, Sports Marketing and Management.

The admission to the Athena School of Management is done on the basis of CAT, XAT, CMAT, and GMAT. The highly qualified faculty include top corporate leaders at CEO, Director and VP level. Athena School of Management won the award for the best upcoming Management College in Mumbai at the International Education Awards (2017).
